Instruction: Mix cornstarch with cold water until dissolved.

Combine warm water, peanut butter, soy sauce, brown sugar, vinegar, and sesame oil in a small saucepan over medium heat, whisking until well blended. Bring to a simmer and cook while whisking continuously until the sugar dissolves, about 1 to 2 minutes. Then, add the cornstarch mixture and simmer until the sauce thickens, 1 to 2 minutes.
Scoop the sauce into a serving bowl and top with peanuts and mint. Serve warm."
